doc:
Lewis Wilson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lewis_Wilson 0 Lewis Gilbert Wilson (January 28, 1920 – August 9, 2000) was an American actor from New York City who was most famous for being the first actor to play DC Comics character Batman on screen in the 1943 film serial Batman. Lewis_Gilbert_Wilson ( January_28_,_1920 – August_9_,_2000 ) was an_American_actor from New_York_City who was most_famous for being the_first_actor to_play DC_Comics character Batman on screen in the_1943_film_serial_Batman .
